name: System Failure (pikachurian)
description:
Entry: 40446
Name: Corruption
Cause: [CLASSIFIED]
Description:  A dark purple-ish substance which corrupts anything that it comes into contact with.  
Cure:  UNKNOWN

Explore The Dilapidated Hospital for health packs to stay alive longer. Avoid the enemies so they don’t corrupt you. Stand next to the computer to empty it’s “cache” and keep it alive. The doors protect the scientists working on a cure, don’t let the “cache” fill up or the computer will crash, opening the security doors that are keeping the scientists alive. note: A blinking warning sign will appear when your computer is about to crash. The levels are randomly generated. You have six shots for shooting the corruption. note: it will reload by itself when you use up your shots. Collect health packs to make sure your hunger doesn’t get too low. Try to get the good ending and beat your best time!

Controls: wasd = move mouse to aim Left-click to shoot E on a health pack to regain health Q on a health pack to un-corrupt yourself R to reload your gun C to toggle a compass on and off to find your way back. Keep it off for more of a challenge! F4 to toggle full screen press enter to skip text

System failure is a game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46. Everything was made in the time limit except the 2D lighting system by Jobo.
